title: Game was working fine last night. Today it cannot load and when attempting to hangs
body: I will go through champ select just fine, no latency, no lag, no problems whatsoever. Then when the game attempts to load it hangs. No bugsplat, no error message, no nothing. I have to kill the process and then when attempting to reconnect it simply hangs again. I've used both the beta and legacy client repair tools and neither have worked. At this point I'm at a loss for what to do about it and I would love some sort of assistance with it. It was working just fine last night but during the day my client restarted and now this is happening.

replies.body: i fixed it by re-installing and not using the new client basically

There's an issue right now where some players are being met with the reconnect screen after champion select.  Per the [status ](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na)notice, you should be able to reconnect after cancelling.  Let me know if that helps.

I am having the same problem and when I try to connect it bugsplats again then i'm sent back to an error screen telling me to reconnect. Because of this, I have been put into Low-Priority queue and that sucks tbh.  How long until this problem is fixed? I played fine yesterday.

The bugsplat you're receiving is independent of the status issue, and might be caused by a driver or game file issue failing to load the game.  I suggest going through the steps of the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide for your specific issue.  That should get you back in game!

happened to me twice and once I was able to recconect and another where my ad player first picked jinx and then was only able to come in at the 3 min mark... Which is a big fuck you because first picking jinx is already retarded and now I have to deal with him coming in 3 mins late as well as him not having any map awareness and him blaming me for all sorts of shit.. and the games I've been in so far are all shit fests I hard carry every fucking game and my team still manages to lose it every fucking time.

How is it possible for me to get a twitch 5 kills and first turret gold within first 10 mins and have the team 7/0 and still lose because they keep getting caught out and don't know how to rotate.

can't get into the game but the instant the end game screen appears It puts me into the lobby with everyone how nice.
Cancelling takes time, hit reconnect, alt tab, force quit the game and go back to the client, hit reconnect and you're good.
